divs: sighting details@ the time , myself and two other family members were outside and on the deck, enjoying a drink , and cigs when i noticed a bright light moving over the house(from west to east) and pointed it out to jack and my mother. the light was bluish-white, silent, and appeared to be high altitude . both jack and my mother thought it was an airplane at first but there was no blinking lights and the light never dimmed as it got further away. we were able to watch it until it disappeared in the horizon\trees in the distance. we were all unsure what we saw but we all agreed it was odd.
trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Tacoma
There was one other sighting in Tacoma on or around May 17th 2009
Summary: Object - was a bright bluish white light moving west to east, silent and took 20 seconds to travel length of visible sky.
